TEXT.S: David Britton nalecuhan i The Bronx, New York, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. David Britton i 1990 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 57, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput. 8 bulad 26 demiad, 1958 a mihca, David Britton, miunduay.
